newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi Aramco changes some bunker fuel prices.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Aramco changes some bunker fuel prices.

text.p: Saudi Aramco has increased the price of A-888 bunker diesel lifted from the Red Sea ports of Jeddah and Yanbu by $3 a tonne to $194 effective March 20.
A-888 from the Gulf ports of Ras Tanura and Dammam rose to $214 a tonne from $212 last week.
Aramco's weekly bunker price telex kept the price of its A-960 bunker fuel oil from the Gulf unchanged at $105 a tonne, while it lifted the price of A-960 from the Red Sea by $1 a tonne to $99.
